short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alternative to BetterTTV's auto modview feature for Twitch - by itsjusttriz

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to input Twitch channels in which the extension scans for. When the user enters a channel from the inputted list, this extension will re-navigate to the Modview for that Twitch channel. Download stored data with the "Backup Config" option as a JSON file.
